name: Spellshot
description:
Fend Off Hordes

Being sent off-world for munitions testing is never a great assignment. Even more so when your destination turns out to be the zombie-infested halls of Caleme Castle. Batten down the hatches or get out and use your legs, corporate doesn't care. As long as you survive long enough for them to collect enough data, they'll be happy (that is, if they even feel emotion).

Empower Your Bullets

While you are enjoying your limited stay at "Zombie Manor", you'll come across a great deal of gems. These empower your bullets, giving them all-around splendid effects such as:
  • Bone-chilling frostburn
  • Noxious gas
  • Piercing hot cinders
  • Immobilizing gunk
  • and much, much more!

Discover New Builds

There's a great deal of purchasing, selling, rerolling, and combining to get to. So what are you waiting on? Get to finding those rare item synergies and special gem combinations.
